mapper.select: SELECT fesfac_cat_nm AS catNm FROM Fes_Fac_Cat

SELECT fac_sta_nm AS staNm, fesfac_cat_nm AS catNm, fest_nm AS festNm, fac_sta_site AS staSite, fac_sta_count AS staCount, com_mem_nm2 AS comNm2, action_dt AS actionDt, action_status AS actionSta FROM Facility_Status

SELECT fac_sta_nm AS staNm, fest_nm AS festNm, facsta_sta_dt AS stastaDt, facsta_end_dt AS staendDt, facsta_ins_mo AS stainsMo, facsta_ins_sc AS stainsSc, facsta_ins_num AS stainsNum, facsta_ins_con AS stainsCon, facsta_work_sta AS staWorksta, facsta_dem_dt AS stademDt, fac_sta_che AS staChe, com_mem_nm2 AS comNm2, facsta_ins_con1 AS stainsCon1, facsta_ins_con2 AS stainsCon2 FROM Temporary_Facility

SELECT fac_sta_nm AS staNm, fest_nm AS festNm, facmai_che_dt AS maicheDt, facmai_ins_in AS maiinsIn, facmai_res_human AS mairesHuman, fac_mai_cad AS maiCad, facmai_rec_dt AS mairecDt, facmai_sta_che AS maistaChe, facmai_sup_dt AS maisupDt, com_mem_nm2 AS comNm2 FROM Facility_Mai
SELECT safins_list_cla AS inslistCla, safins_list_con AS inslistCon FROM Saf_Ins_List
